title: Project Skins ate my RP twice
body: Today was the release of Project Alpha skins and there're issues with the store crashing but what i didn't know is that the store charged me twice for the Project Lucian skin and  Project ward. Riot please refund.

replies.body:
+1 to Deep Terror Nami. It may have been a visual bug. 

If you're still not seeing the correct amount of RP, please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can adjust your RP accordingly.
Visual bug. Log out and back in and it should update correctly.
